name: Fast Aweber
author: FastFlow

sections.description:
Fast Aweber is designed to work seamlessly with both the Fast Flow Dashboard and Fast Member

Once your contacts have been added to WordPress you now have the ability to sync their Fast Tags and Fast Member purchases.

Fast Tags can be used to trigger automations on any other integrated platform which is supported by our growing number Fast Flow addons.

NOTE: Fast Aweber requires the Fast Flow Dashboard to enter the API details and utilise the user tagging.

https://wordpress.org/plugins/fast-flow-dashboard/

You can find out more about Fast Flow here

https://fastflow.io
sections.installation:
NOTE: This plugin requires the Fast Flow Dashboard to enter the Aweber API settings.

Upload through your WordPress admin or via FTP.

Once uploaded simply activate and then navigate to the settings of the Fast Flow Dashboard and enter your Aweber API details.
sections.changelog:
1.1.4

Fix for saving settings

1.1.3

Added Passing of custom fields from Fast Forms

1.1.2

Full support for Fast Forms

1.1.1

Update for Fast Form action

1.1.0

  • Prepared for repository release
